songs.lyrics:
[DISTORTED INAUDIBLE VOICE]

(Restore the indigo)

[Outro]
People laugh and they just shout in the bathroom
I'm not down, I’m tryna chill
Kids nowadays, they're all hooked up on these other things that ain't future
And I’m gonna cry 'cause it's sad
We gotta restore the indigo in all of our souls
We gotta let go off the darkness that pass us all
And we don't know
No, we don't know

We're just restoring the indigo in our lives
Restoring everything that is us
And everything that makes us what we are
songs.title: Indigo in da Soul
